title: 【Cthuwork】Cthuzine English! 第一期发布
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kaho 于 2014-11-15 11:21 编辑 



注意
本帖的最终解释权归cthuwork及原作者所有如有疑问或转载请联系相关负责人




CTHUZINE English! Quarterly, As Simple, As possible!CTHUZINE English! 季刊，越简单，越深入人心！

Produced about a week, Cthuzine English! No.1 publish at 10/1!
The contents has lots of different between English versions and Chinese versions
We'll try to publish Chinese and English version at the same time!

制作了大概一周，Cthuzine English! 终于发布！
英文版和中文版的内容是不一样的
我们尽量会与中文版同一时间发布！

(以英文版为准，中文版仅供参考)
(English version is the standard one,Chinese version is only for information.)




Start Reading!
开始阅读！

 











News Source:poweredbyredstone.net
新闻来源：poweredbyredstone.net

如果你想对Cthuzine & Cthuzine English! 了解更多，关注我们的微博吧！
